title: Excuse me, you filthy ADC's.
body:
How dare you just waltz into my jungle and steal my buffs, when not even two minutes ago I got you a double kill and didn't even tax you for it. As I am a team player and don't just steal other teammates source of gold and exp. You have no right to walk into MY JUNGLE and steal MY BUFFS ruining MY JUNGLE CLEAR PATH, then tell me to stfu as you're the carry and you need the red more than me. Then blame your support because you over extended and died and then lost MY RED BUFF within 37 seconds.

Stay the hell out of my jungle peasants, to advanced for you right click to win.

replies.body: I never get this... the worst I have had is when I get a five man invade from the enemy team in my jg and my team gets themselves killed trying to help
This sht happens way too often...
